alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 11:15AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Minnesota, including the following counties, Kittson, Marshall and Polk. * WHEN...Until 400 PM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1112 AM CDT, satellite estimates indicate overland flooding from Snow Melt. Latest satellite indicates the majority of overland flooding over western portions of Kittson, Marshall, and Polk counties.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
